Text: Revised LM Breakout Contract Amounts Cc Kay After talking with Catherine Clark this afternoon I realized that I had misallocated change order to the wrong PSCO turbines in the spreadsheet I sent you earlier Here is the revised spreadsheet with the correct turbine allocations per Catherine Thanks Rebecca x

Coral Energy DB Cc Here is the DB on Coral Energy LLC Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on PM Cindy CT PM To Rebecca nron cc Subject Coral Energy DB Rebecca Greetings from eSource Attached is the DB report you requested for Coral Energy Give a call with any questions or problems Thanks Cindy eSource x
LM Breakout Contract Amounts Cc find a contract payment summary for the LM turbines Feel free to contact me with any questions Rebecca Walker
GE ContractPayment SummaryHere is the GE spreadsheet Regards Rebecca
ABB New Option Allocation Cc the revised ABB spreadsheet showing the new option premium allocations we discussed this morning Regards Rebecca x

ABB AddressEquipment Status Cc Karla Hesketh at ABB gave me the following information about transformer status and location LNL and LNL Austin are at the Austin job site LNL and LNL ESA have been cancelled LNL and LNL LV Cogen are not scheduled to ship until LNL PSCO went into storage on LNL PSCO is scheduled to go into storage on LNL PSCO is scheduled to go into storage on LNL Coral is scheduled to go into storage on The storage facilities are located onsite at the ABB factory at the following address Semple Ave St Louis Missouri Please let me know if you need any other information Thanks Rebecca x
ABB Change OrderHere is the change order that Mike Sandridge signed this morning Rebecca

PLEASE REVIEW Changes to Northwestern Letter Agreement Cc Attached are changes to the Northwestern EA Letter Agreement Per Ben Jacobys request I have updated the Remaining Purchase Amount Instalment Schedule III Amounts Catherine Clark in Global Finance has signed off on these numbers as well Please call me at x if you have any questions Regards Rebecca

FW Signature Pages and WireLet me know if you would like me to help coordinate sending the originals to the Northwestern attorney at Paul Hastings Thanks Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on AM Keffer John SLAWcom on AM To cc Subject FW Signature Pages and Wire Heres the email with the signatures I sent earlier today Original Message From Keffer John Sent Thursday April AM To Jeremiah A DeBerry Email Cc C Kay Mann Email Michael Young Email Ben F Jacoby Email Reuter Marisa Subject Signature Pages and Wire Jerryas we discussed here are PDF files containing Enrons signature pages to the Letter Agreement and the two Change Orders As soon as you receive these you will send to Ben Kay and me your clients signature pages to the Letter Agreement and Guarantee and Mike will begin the wire transfer of million Mike will also send to Ben Kay and me the Fed reference number as soon as he gets it Finally as agreed Paul Hastings will assemble the documents for distribution to the parties To that end Kay please send the originals of the signature pages by overnight delivery to Jerry Regards John L Keffer King Spalding fax NWltragmtpdf copdf copdf Confidentiality Notice This message is being sent by or on behalf of a lawyer It is intended exclusively for the individual or entity to which it is addressed This communication may contain information that is proprietary privileged or confidential or otherwise legally exempt from disclosure If you are not the named addressee you are not authorized to read print retain copy or disseminate this message or any part of it If you have received this message in error please notify the sender immediately by email and delete all copies of the message NWltragmtpdf copdf copdf
Receipt of Funds Cc Our accounting department has confirmed that the million dollars has been received into Enrons account Thanks Rebecca Walker

RE FW Blue Dog Max COs and Cc Can I come up to your office some time today to pick up fax copies of the executed version of co I need to give copies to Global Finance and Accounting in order to get the invoice paid If its easier you can also fax them to me at x Thanks Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on AM From Ben F Jacoby ECT AM Sent by Ben CT To Rebecca NRON cc Subject RE FW Blue Dog Max COs and Kay already has executed fax copies Does GF need originals Usually fax copies suffice Enron North America Corp From Rebecca Walker ENRON AM To Ben CT cc Subject RE FW Blue Dog Max COs and Ben Please let me know when you get the copies of the change order I need to give executed copies to Global Finance and accounting in order to pay the co invoice Thanks Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on AM From Ben F Jacoby ECT AM Sent by Ben CT To ENRON cc Chris nron Rebecca nron Kay nron Subject RE FW Blue Dog Max COs and Jeff That would be fine Please send to my attention at EBa Ben on AM To cc Subject RE FW Blue Dog Max COs and Ben Please let me know how you would like to complete this process Would you like me to send you two original signed copies and then you could return one with your signature Please advise Jeff Global Power Plant Systems fax Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Darst Jeffrey A PS PPSD Cc Chase Clark PS Contractor PPSD Schroeder John H Jr PS Sales Subject RE FW Blue Dog Max COs and Jeff Attached is the most recent version I think version of CO which we understood had been approved both by GE and ENA I hope this clears up our misunderstanding With respect to CO we have incorporated your final changes Please find attached a marked and clean ie executable copy At your earliest convenience please sign the clean copy where indicated and scan and email me the signed copy I will call you first thing in the morning Regards Ben See attached file CORdocSee attached file Final CO cleandoc See attached file Final CO markeddoc

Re Letter to GE Payment of Invoices Cc According to my calculations all of these numbers are correct Regards Rebecca From Chris Booth PM To Rebecca nron Catherine nronXGate cc Ben CT Kay nron Subject Letter to GE Payment of Invoices Ladies Please review the attached letter that I plan on sending to General Electric regarding the payment of recent invoices I would like to obtain your concurrence on the amounts that I have set forth in the letter Thanks Chris
Blue Dog Change OrdersI have the original Blue Dog Change Orders from GE for you to initial Please let me know what a convenient time would be to bring them up to your office Thanks Rebecca x

Change OrdersAre you available to sign those Blue Dog Change Orders this afternoon Sorry I keep asking you about this Ben gave them to me on Friday so I want to get them signed and the copy sent back to GE today if possible Thanks Rebecca x

Blue Dog Change Orders and Cc Since Chris Booth is out of the office Ben Jacoby has asked me to coordinate sending you the executed originals for Blue Dog Change Orders and I have retained one set of originals for our records and I am sending the other set of originals to you via Fed Ex tonight If you have any questions or concerns feel free to contact me at Regards Rebecca Walker

payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Cc Ben asked me to forward you this letter from Jeff Darst at GE Attached is a copy of the letter from Chris Booth dated May rd to which GE is responding Regards Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on PM on PM To cc Subject payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Chris Please see attached letter original to follow via FedEx Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf

payment of invoices Blue Dog Maxinfo on the blue dog invoice LDretention issue Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on PM From Rebecca Walker PM To Ben CT cc Chris nron Subject payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Ben The way we actually paid the invoices changed slightly after Chris had sent the letter to GE We deducted the LDs and the retention amount from the April th invoice since the May invoice was not due until May th On May th a wire totalling was sent to GE this represented for the co invoice and for the April th invoice less the LDs and retention To respond to Jeff Darsts letter we can say that we are planning on paying the May th invoice in full assuming were not planning on deducting additional LDs for May May We just need to clarify with Jeff that both the LD and the retention were deducted from the April invoice and then we can deal with resolving the issues he discusses in his letter Regards Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on PM on PM To cc Subject payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Chris Please see attached letter original to follow via FedEx Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf

Blue Dog Meeting TodayWhen are you available today to get together and call Ben about the Blue Dog invoices As far as I know Bens only conflict today is a meeting from Houston time and I can come up to your office any time Also an attorney from King Spalding I believe she said her name was Marisa Rudder left a message for me last night asking about the status of the original closing documents for the Blue DogNorthwestern transaction Do you know where these are Thanks Rebecca x Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on AM From Ben F Jacoby ECT PM Sent by Ben CT To Rebecca Walker cc Subject Re payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Rebecca Please coordinate a time with Kay that will work I will be in CA and will join by phone Thanks Ben Forwarded by Ben JacobyHOUECT on PM Kay NRON AM To Ben F CT cc Rebecca nron Chris CT Subject Re payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Looks like Friday will work From Ben F Jacoby ECT PM Sent by Ben CT To Rebecca NRON cc Chris BoothNAEnron Kay Mann Subject Re payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Before we send anything other than the thank you email I sent to Jeff and before we have any conversations with GE on this point we need to seek Kays guidance based on her read of the contract and the issues Jeff raised in his letter Kay will you have some time to talk about this Friday Regards Ben Enron North America Corp From Rebecca Walker ENRON PM To Ben CT cc Chris nron Subject payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Ben The way we actually paid the invoices changed slightly after Chris had sent the letter to GE We deducted the LDs and the retention amount from the April th invoice since the May invoice was not due until May th On May th a wire totalling was sent to GE this represented for the co invoice and for the April th invoice less the LDs and retention To respond to Jeff Darsts letter we can say that we are planning on paying the May th invoice in full assuming were not planning on deducting additional LDs for May May We just need to clarify with Jeff that both the LD and the retention were deducted from the April invoice and then we can deal with resolving the issues he discusses in his letter Regards Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on PM on PM To cc Subject payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Chris Please see attached letter original to follow via FedEx Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf

Re Search for sigsI do have those sig pages Sorry about that I thought I had already given them to you I will bring them up to you this morning Regards Rebecca Kay Mann PM To Rebecca nron cc Subject Search for sigs Hi Rebecca Im trying to locate the sig pages for the NW guaranty These were the docs that I approved after I had approved the letter agreement These signed pages werent with the letter agreements and change orders you brought me To you remember if you brought them to me before I havent really searched I thought I would ask first Thanks Kay
Out of the Office Cc I will be out of the office on vacation from Thursday May st Tuesday June th Please contact Sharon Hausinger x if you need any assistance during that time Regards Rebecca

payment of invoices Blue Dog Maxinfo on the blue dog invoice LDretention issue Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on PM From Rebecca Walker PM To Ben CT cc Chris nron Subject payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Ben The way we actually paid the invoices changed slightly after Chris had sent the letter to GE We deducted the LDs and the retention amount from the April th invoice since the May invoice was not due until May th On May th a wire totalling was sent to GE this represented for the co invoice and for the April th invoice less the LDs and retention To respond to Jeff Darsts letter we can say that we are planning on paying the May th invoice in full assuming were not planning on deducting additional LDs for May May We just need to clarify with Jeff that both the LD and the retention were deducted from the April invoice and then we can deal with resolving the issues he discusses in his letter Regards Rebecca Forwarded by Rebecca WalkerNAEnron on PM on PM To cc Subject payment of invoices Blue Dog Max Chris Please see attached letter original to follow via FedEx Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf Microsoft Word BDMpdf

Re Coal PresentationHere is some information I put together when I was working on the coal presentation The preliminary ecomonics tab looks at the dispatch spread between coal and natural gas and the difference in variable OM for coal and natural gas plants If you need a model for a coal plant I would suggest talking to the Generation Investments group They are working on a deal where they are buying some coal plants the Allstrom Deal and have created models for coal plant ecomomics I believe Chuck Ward and Bill Keeney are spearheading that effort Please let me know if you have any questions about what Ive sent you or if I can help you with anything else Thanks Rebecca x
